document_data.mainbody:
ed was a horse belonging to Farmer Bortas in the midâ€“14 century DR.
On Eleasias 16 in the , Ned was pulling a wagon with Farmer Bortas and his wife when they saw the ghost of the bandit chieftain Fastred. Bortas whipped poor Ned and they fled to the Swamp Rat tavern to raised a posse of fellow farmers to go ghost-hunting. Neds involvement is unknown.
